In addition to the headline result we also include the following related changes:

- we promote `RootPairing.IsReduced` to a typeclass
- we introduce the definition `RootPairing.InvariantForm` (this allows us to drop ordering assumptions on scalars)

---

```suggestion
theorem extracted (R : Type*) [CommRing R] [CharZero R] [NoZeroDivisors R] (x y z : R)
    (hij : x = 2 * y ∨ x = 3 * y ∨ y = 2 * x ∨ y = 3 * x)
    (hik : x = 2 * z ∨ x = 3 * z ∨ z = 2 * x ∨ z = 3 * x)
    (hjk : y = 2 * z ∨ y = 3 * z ∨ z = 2 * y ∨ z = 3 * y) :
    x = 0 ∧ y = 0 ∧ z = 0 := by
  suffices y * z = 0 by 
    simp only [mul_eq_zero, or_assoc] at this
    obtain rfl | rfl := this <;>
    simp_all
  let S : Finset (ℕ × ℕ) := {(1, 2), (1, 3), (2, 1), (3, 1)}
  obtain ⟨ab, hab, hxy⟩ : ∃ ab ∈ S, ab.1 * x = ab.2 * y := by 
    simpa [exists_or, or_and_right, eq_comm, S] using hij
  obtain ⟨cd, hcd, hxz⟩ : ∃ cd ∈ S, cd.1 * x = cd.2 * z := by 
    simpa [exists_or, or_and_right, eq_comm, S] using hik
  obtain ⟨ef, hef, hyz⟩ : ∃ ef ∈ S, ef.1 * y = ef.2 * z := by 
    simpa [exists_or, or_and_right, eq_comm, S] using hjk
  have h₁ : ab.1 * cd.2 * ef.1 ≠ ab.2 * cd.1 * ef.2 := by clear! R; decide +revert
  have h₂ : (ab.1 * cd.2 * ef.1 : R) ≠ ab.2 * cd.1 * ef.2 := mod_cast h₁
  have h₄ : (ab.1 * cd.2 * ef.1 - ab.2 * cd.1 * ef.2) * (y * z) = 0 := by 
    linear_combination z * cd.1 * ef.2 * hxy - ab.1 * ef.1 * y * hxz + ab.1 * x * cd.1 * hyz
  simpa [mul_eq_zero, sub_eq_zero, h₂, false_or] using h₄
```
not committing this yet in case there are more golfs
(cc @digama0)

```suggestion
theorem extracted (R : Type*) [CommRing R] [CharZero R] [NoZeroDivisors R] (x y z : R)
    (hij : x = 2 * y ∨ x = 3 * y ∨ y = 2 * x ∨ y = 3 * x)
    (hik : x = 2 * z ∨ x = 3 * z ∨ z = 2 * x ∨ z = 3 * x)
    (hjk : y = 2 * z ∨ y = 3 * z ∨ z = 2 * y ∨ z = 3 * y) :
    x = 0 ∧ y = 0 ∧ z = 0 := by
  suffices y = 0 ∨ z = 0 by apply this.elim <;> rintro rfl <;> simp_all
  let S : Finset (ℕ × ℕ) := {(1, 2), (1, 3), (2, 1), (3, 1)}
  obtain ⟨ab, hab, hxy⟩ : ∃ ab ∈ S, ab.1 * x = ab.2 * y := by simp_all [eq_comm, S]
  obtain ⟨cd, hcd, hxz⟩ : ∃ cd ∈ S, cd.1 * x = cd.2 * z := by simp_all [eq_comm, S]
  obtain ⟨ef, hef, hyz⟩ : ∃ ef ∈ S, ef.1 * y = ef.2 * z := by simp_all [eq_comm, S]
  have : (ab.1 * cd.2 * ef.1 : R) ≠ ab.2 * cd.1 * ef.2 := by norm_cast; clear! R; decide +revert
  have : (ab.1 * cd.2 * ef.1 - ab.2 * cd.1 * ef.2) * (y * z) = 0 := by 
    linear_combination z * cd.1 * ef.2 * hxy - ab.1 * ef.1 * y * hxz + ab.1 * x * cd.1 * hyz
  simp_all [sub_eq_zero]
```
